explanation: [0-0] The screen is split in two. The upper half is black with the words "Utusan TV", "SANTAI", "Cahaya misteri dirakam di Bangsar Village 2", "What you saw", and a red arrow pointing down. The lower half shows a young boy in a white and brown outfit, wearing red glasses and a white hat. Behind him is a red circular object with red spikes around its circumference. The boy has a green border around him. At the top of this frame are the words "What really happened" in white.

[0-4] The red arrow in the upper frame moves left and right. In the lower frame, the boy is initially standing on steps, then the shot cuts to him wearing red and black gloves and a glowing watch on his right wrist. He has his arms crossed, and the circular object on his back emits a yellow glow. He then extends his arms, launching the red circular object.
